::FireBlade::
FireBLade frowned as the bomb never stuck.
Then the boom....It was so close to him it damged him alot and to add
to that the pincer snapped shut right on his neck though his theck
plates holding hte cut from going all the way through.  When the smoke
cleared FireBlade lay motionless on the groung his spark weakining and
IR was......

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
>
> * Iron Raptor smiled mentally to herself once the acid struck
FireBlade, but
> a sudden movement caught her attention. Her head snapped towards the
motion,
> just seeing the back end of Switchblade but it was too late then.
> Though a sudden sharp pain caught IR in the side as the blade of the
sword
> sank in deep to her side, acidic mech-fluid spurting out from either
side of
> the blade and right towards FireBlade.
> Pain exploded in her mind as bright lights before she brought
herself to
> reach and grab the sword, reefing it out of her side and throwing it
away (
> that is, if FB isn't hanging onto the handle, then she just pulled
it out.
> :)
> Iron Raptor hissed and bared her teeth down on FireBlade, rearing up
on her
> hind legs and slamming her hands down at him, trying to pin him to the
> ground.
> Though before he could stick the bomb into her tail, the end of it
opened up
> to create two blades, like scissors, and positioned itself above his
head.
> Though that wasn't the end of the bomb.
> Since it must have been set to blow quickly, it exploded and a ball
of fire
> rushed up, creating a blinding cloud of smoak.
> And just then, the end of the tail whipped down, ready to snap shut on
> contact.*
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
